description: React component VideoPlayer renders a video player supporting MP4, YouTube, and Vimeo sources, with Picture-in-Picture (PiP) functionality and embedded video handling.

methods.name: VideoPlayer({ video })
methods.description: Default exported React functional component that renders a video or embedded iframe with PiP controls.

methods.name: tryEnterPipForIframe
methods.description: Attempts to enter Picture-in-Picture mode for embedded iframes, with checks for browser support and feedback messages.

methods.name: handlePip
methods.description: Handles click event for PiP button, toggling PiP mode for MP4 videos or attempting for embedded iframes.
